title: Build a Perfect Masonry Layout with HTML and CSS
excerpt: A masonry layout arranges items in columns rather than rows. It's called masonry because the layout loosely mimics bricks stacking tightly together.
author: Angela

title: Five Tips for Junior Developers
excerpt: I've been a frontend developer for 11 years, many of those as a hiring manager, and these are all things that helped me to get a job.
author: Angela
